H0.text: Who discovered the electrical nature of lightning through his famous kite experiment in 1750. Benjamin Franklin

H1.text: Who discovered the electrical nature of lightning through his famous kite experiment in 1750. Alessandro Volta

H2.text: Who discovered the electrical nature of lightning through his famous kite experiment in 1750. Michael Faraday

H3.text: Who discovered the electrical nature of lightning through his famous kite experiment in 1750. Franklinic

A4.text: Franklin may possibly have conducted his well-known kite experiment in Philadelphia on June 15, 1752, successfully extracting sparks from a cloud.

A5.text: He used the kite to collect some electric charge from a storm cloud, showing that lightning was electrical.
